item.title: The White House starts demolishing part of the East Wing to build Trump's ballroom
item.description: Dramatic photos show construction equipment tearing into the East Wing façade and windows, though the federal agency that oversees such projects has not approved President Trump's 90,000-square-foot, $250 million ballroom.

item.title: This isn't the Louvre's first high-profile heist. Here's a history of earlier thefts
item.description: Masked thieves stole priceless jewels from the Louvre on Sunday morning. The Paris museum has suffered a string of successful art heists, dating back to the theft of the Mona Lisa in 1911.

item.title: Cannabis blunts back pain in 2 new studies
item.description: Millions of Americans use weed to treat chronic pain, but there's little high quality research on whether it works. New findings suggest it can be effective for low back pain, on par with opioids.
